recipesJson.name: Stacio RY4-U One-Shot
recipesJson.author: ENYAWREKLAW
recipesJson.description:
This is the One-Shot for the full flavored sugar cookie, rich caramel RY4, with soft bright pistachio recipe Stacio RY4-U

Pick up Stacio RY4-U here:
(US) -- https://diyordie.link/stacio-atf
(UK/EU) -- https://diyordie.link/stacio-atf-uk

Flavor & Recipe Development Notes:
https://diyordie.link/stacio-atf-recipe
